00099     /*
00100      * @brief Parses node information
00101      * Tries to parse a node. If the node can be parsed, it is stored within
00102      *  "myNodeCont". Otherwise an error is generated. Then, if given
00103      *  the tls information is parsed and inserted into "myTLLogicCont".
00104      */

00106 
00107     /*

00109      */

00111 
00112     /*
00113      * @brief Parses a cluster of nodes to be joined
00114      */

00116 
00117     /*
00118      * @brief Parses a list of nodes to be excluded from joining
00119      */
